last_episode_to_air.name: Sigh
last_episode_to_air.overview: The answers are finally unveiled in the season finale.

name: Harper's Island
overview: A group of family and friends travels to a secluded island for a destination wedding. They've come to laugh... to love... and, though they don't know it... to die. As the wedding festivities begin, friendships are tested and secrets exposed as a murderer claims victims, one by one, transforming the wedding week of fun and celebration into a terrifying struggle for survival.

episodes.name: Whap
episodes.overview: Abby Mills returns to Harper's Island for the wedding celebration of her best friend, Henry Dunn, and his fiance, Trish Wellington. Abby hasn't been home in seven years, since her mother and five others were murdered by John Wakefield.

episodes.name: Crackle
episodes.overview: The wedding party heads out on a scavenger hunt. While out, Trish meets up with an old flame, Henry talks to the locals, and Abby runs into a friend who has been haunted by John Wakefield.

episodes.name: Ka-Blam
episodes.overview: When a local girl’s death is ruled a suicide, Abby challenges her father, the Sheriff, to investigate what really happened. As the wedding approaches, Trish must come to a decision about Hunter.

episodes.name: Bang
episodes.overview: The groomsmen take Henry fishing for his bachelor party and make a gruesome discovery. The bridesmaids celebrate Trish's final days as a bachelorette with a psychic who has a very strong reaction to Abby.

episodes.name: Thwack
episodes.overview: A father/daughter bike ride in the woods leads to a startling revelation. Abby uncovers the Sheriff's secret obsession as Trish and Henry's wedding rehearsal takes an unexpected turn.

episodes.name: Thrack, Splat, Sizzle
episodes.overview: The wedding guests begin preparing to leave the island but the Sheriff suspects that one of them is the killer. Some new information reveals an eerie connection between Abby and Wakefield.

episodes.name: Gurgle
episodes.overview: As the guests get ready to leave the island, one guest mysteriously disappears. Abby receives a phone call from someone threatening to kill the missing guest if anyone leaves the island.

episodes.name: Seep
episodes.overview: The group turn against each other. However they find a map and are forced to come together to find  Madison.

episodes.name: Snap
episodes.overview: An attempt to leave the island after Katherine has been killed turns into a disaster that will keep the remaining members of the wedding trapped for now. Meanwhile they find out a secret that will leave them reeling, and four more victims are claimed.

episodes.name: Splash
episodes.overview: Abby confronts the killer, but the guests start thinking he may have an accomplice. Another guest dies and another goes missing.

episodes.name: Gasp
episodes.overview: Eight of the suspects battle for survival as the truth is revealed.

episodes.name: Sigh
episodes.overview: The answers are finally unveiled in the season finale.
